testcase.classname: Given the food helper when rendering the component
testcase.name: should render "Hello world"

testcase.classname: Given the food helper when we pass our own props
testcase.name: should render "Hey dude"

testcase.classname: Given the food helper when we feed the component after the first render
testcase.name: should render "Dear component"

testcase.classname: Given the food helper when we feed before to have the component rendered
testcase.name: should render "Dear programmer"

testcase.classname: Given the waitFor helper when initial rendering
testcase.name: should render nothing

testcase.classname: Given the waitFor helper when calling the "done" callback
testcase.name: should render "Hey dude"
